
Software files associated with the March 2011 
IEEE "Tips & Tricks" article "Reducing FFT Scalloping 
Loss Errors Without Multiplication".

File: "FlattopWind_Interbin_Resp.m"
    Matlab code provided by R. Lyons.

File: "main.cpp"
    "C" code provided by Clay Turner.

File: "Chart.csv"
    Data file in "comma separated" format that 
    can be opened, for example by Microsoft Excel,
    provided by Clay Turner.
